name: MACD crossover detection
description: Detect MACD signal line crossovers (bullish and bearish)
query: SELECT timestamp, price, macd, signal_line, (macd - signal_line) as histogram, CASE WHEN macd > signal_line THEN 'BULLISH' ELSE 'BEARISH' END as trend FROM t WHERE ABS(macd - signal_line) < 1.0
